scripts.link-sdk: (cd sdk && pnpm build) && for starter in starters/*; do (cd $starter && npm pkg set dependencies.rwsdk='workspace:*'); done && pnpm install --ignore-scripts --no-frozen-lockfile
scripts.check-starters:dev: for starter in starters/*; do ./scripts/check-app.sh dev $starter; done
scripts.check-starters:preview: for starter in starters/*; do ./scripts/check-app.sh preview $starter; done
scripts.test:e2e: (cd sdk && pnpm build) && cd playground && vitest run
